editionStmt.p: The initial version of this file was created from data kindly provided by the Ethiopic Manuscript Imaging Project directed by Steve Delamarter.

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

licence.p: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0.

msContents.summary: F-33r: Prayer of Mary at Bartos, መጽሐፈ፡ ባርቶስ፡. StrLin 54; AbbCat 153, Notice 201. Conti Rossini, “La redazione etiopica della preghiera della Vergine fra i Parti,” RRAL 5 (1896) 462 –79; Basset, Apocryphes V 11 –30. F-61v: Bandlet of Righteousness, Lǝfafä Ṣǝdǝq, ልፋፈ፡ ጽድቅ፡. Bandlet, EurBinde. F-76v: Book of disciples, መጽሐፈ፡ አርድእት፡. F-102r: Prayer of Saint Peter, ጸሎቱ፡ ለጴጥሮስ፡. F-108r: Asmat prayer which Jesus Christ gave to the disciples at the Mount of Olives. Incipit: ለነ ለሐዋርያቲሁ ወሀበነ ዘንተ አስማተ በደብረ ዘይት. F-117r: Asmat prayer, "Let the Asmat prayer of Jesus Christ bless us." F-132v: Prayer of Forgiveness of Sin of the Disciples, ጸሎተ: ሥርየት: እምነቶሙ: ዘሐዋርያት: ወለኩሎሙ: 70ወ2 አርድእት: Illuminations. i r: Annunciation. ii r: Saint Mary and another Saint. ii v: Saint Mary (facing right), flanked by an angel. : Two female Saints facing one another. : The Holy Family. : Jesus disputing with Satan. Notes. (and passim): mentions an owner, ሣህለ እግዚአብሔር. The book has been foliated with blue stamped numbers in the lower recto corner. : 4 x 4 grid with play on አናንያ.

revisionDesc.change: Created XML record from EMIP Collection Metadata.xsls
